tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE company_policies (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_title VARCHAR(255), policy_content TEXT);
CREATE TABLE employee_access (employee_id INT, policy_id INT, access_level VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES company_policies(policy_id));

CREATE TABLE company_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_title VARCHAR(255),
    policy_description TEXT,
    effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_roles (
    role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role_name VARCHAR(50),
    responsibilities TEXT,
    department_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(50),
    manager_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE company_policies (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_title VARCHAR(100),
    policy_description TEXT,
    policy_category VARCHAR(50),
    policy_effective_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(100),
    employee_email VARCHAR(100),
    employee_department VARCHAR(50),
    employee_job_title VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_policies (
    emp_policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    policy_id UUID REFERENCES company_policies(policy_id),
    agreement_date DATE,
    is_accepted BOOLEAN
);
